Trade/Device Name(s): AG-608N Single Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-608N MULTI Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Andon Medical AG-608N Single and MULTI Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, palm, forearm, upper arm, calf, and thigh; single system for self-testing by one person at home, MULTI system for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings, both as aids to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
